titles.title: College Savings Flexibility Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow distributions from 529 plans for the payment of student loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/15/2010--Introduced. College Savings Flexibility Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow, between 2010 and 2015, distributions from a qualified tuition program to pay for principal and interest owed on student loans.
